name: Clockwork Pugilist
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Brass Onslaught (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The pugilist moves up to 10 ft. and makes one fist attack. If it hits the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

reactions.name: Get Down Sir!
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 ft. of the pugilist is targeted by a ranged attack or spell the pugilist steps in the way and the ranged attack or spell targets the pugilist instead.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: +2 to its AC vs. one melee attack that would hit it. Must see attacker and have at least one hand empty.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: A clockwork pugilist doesn't require air food drink or sleep.
